name: Dragon Ball: FighterZ
notes: Works only when replacing EAC dlls with Paladins' EAC dlls. WARNING: Use Multiplayer at your own risk. You might get banned otherwise. Lutris is not responsible should you ignore this.
content:
files:
- EAC64: $WINESTEAM:444090/Binaries/EasyAntiCheat/EasyAntiCheat_x64.dll
- EAC32: $WINESTEAM:444090/Binaries/EasyAntiCheat/EasyAntiCheat_x86.dll
- dx2010: https://lutris.net/files/tools/directx-2010.tar.gz
game:
  appid: 678950
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/dxsetup
    file: dx2010
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    executable: $CACHE/dxsetup/DXSETUP.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2015 win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- rename:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/EasyAntiCheat/EasyAntiCheat_x64.dll.bak
    src: $GAMEDIR/EasyAntiCheat/EasyAntiCheat_x64.dll
- rename:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/EasyAntiCheat/EasyAntiCheat_x86.dll.bak
    src: $GAMEDIR/EasyAntiCheat/EasyAntiCheat_x86.dll
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/EasyAntiCheat
    src: EAC64
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/EasyAntiCheat
    src: EAC32
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
